definition: see 壓根兒|压根儿[ya4 gen1 r5]
to press/to push down/to keep under (control)/pressure
flat/(coll.) to beat (sb) up/old variant of 匾[bian3]

sentences.english: The bus was so packed and I got totally squished this morning.
sentences.chinese: 公交車擠滿了人，我今天早上幾乎被壓扁了。

sentences.english: Place tablespoonfuls of mixture onto a baking paper lined tray. Flatten slightly with a floured fork.
sentences.chinese: 湯勺將混合勺滿烤紙，叉將其稍微壓扁。

sentences.english: The flattening is done by crushing tubes between two parallel surfaces.
sentences.chinese: 使用兩個平行面的壓扁機將管材壓扁。

sentences.english: The flattening is done by crushing tubes between two parallel surfaces.
sentences.chinese: 使用兩個平行面的壓扁機將管材壓扁。

sentences.english: Roll rice into circular shape, press to make patties, sprinkle sesame on top.
sentences.chinese: 將飯搓成球狀，壓扁成米餅狀，在上面灑上芝麻。

sentences.english: I want the satisfaction of 1) squishing this bug myself.
sentences.chinese: 我要自己享受壓扁這隻蟲子的滿足感。

sentences.english: The impact accordioned the car beneath the truck.
sentences.chinese: 砰地一撞，小轎車在卡車底下被壓扁了。

sentences.english: I want the satisfaction of 1 squishing this a myself.
sentences.chinese: 我要自己享受壓扁這隻蟲子的滿足感。

sentences.english: A length of aluminum tubing, flattened at its tip in a vertical plane, serves as a pointer .
sentences.chinese: 端點沿直面壓扁的一段細鋁管，作爲指針之用。

sentences.english: The compressed symbol allowed the transcriber to complete the letter in a single stroke.
sentences.chinese: 這個壓扁的符號讓謄寫者用單筆劃結束書信。

sentences.english: The first pass width of stainless steel wire flattening rolling can be calculated by E.
sentences.chinese: 鋼絲壓扁過程中的第一道次寬展量可用E。

sentences.english: For example if a rubber ball bounces and hits the ground it will tend to flatten when it hits.
sentences.chinese: 比如一個橡皮球彈跳後落到地面時身體會被壓扁。

sentences.english: Flatten into 8-inch circle. Brush with oil.
sentences.chinese: 用手掌將其稍微壓扁成8寸左右大小的圓狀。

sentences.english: It flattens the world and the people in it.
sentences.chinese: 總之，世界和裏面的人都一起被壓扁了。

sentences.english: He found that his hat had been pancaked under a suitcase.
sentences.chinese: 他發現他的帽子在衣箱底下被壓扁了。
